keyMoments.title: Zoro Defeats CP9 Agent Kaku
keyMoments.description: Zoro successfully defeats one of CP9's strongest agents using his newly manifested Asura technique, marking a major victory in the crew's mission to rescue Robin.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's growth and ability to overcome the World Government's elite forces.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Reveals Gear 2 Against Lucci
keyMoments.description: Luffy activates Gear 2 for the first time in his battle against Rob Lucci, showing the crew's enhanced combat capabilities.
keyMoments.significance: Major power-up for the crew's captain, demonstrating their preparation for facing the strongest enemies.

keyMoments.title: Kaku Defeated by Zoro
keyMoments.description: CP9 agent Kaku is defeated by Roronoa Zoro's Asura technique, marking the first major loss for CP9 in the Enies Lobby battles.
keyMoments.significance: Represents a significant blow to CP9's forces and demonstrates that the Straw Hats can overcome the World Government's elite assassins.

keyMoments.title: Rob Lucci's Hybrid Form Revealed
keyMoments.description: CP9 leader Rob Lucci transforms into his leopard-human hybrid form, showcasing the full power of CP9's strongest agent.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the battle to its highest level and demonstrates why Lucci is considered CP9's most dangerous member.
